mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_ID ,REPLY, REPLYER, BOARD_ID) VALUES(REPLY_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{reply},#{replyer},#{boardId})
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET reply=#{reply}, replyer=#{replyer}, BOARD_ID=#{boardId}, REPLY_UPDATE_DATE=sysdate WHERE REPLY_ID=#{replyId}
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_ID, BOARD_ID, reply, replyer, REPLY_DATE, REPLY_UPDATE_DATE FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_ID=#{boardId}
